member.name: M:_2D_RPG.Main.Draw(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.GameTime)
member.summary: Handles the drawing of the game scene each frame.
member.param: Provides a snapshot of timing values, such as the time elapsed since the last update.
member.remarks: This method clears the screen to a specific color, begins the sprite batch for rendering, and handles animations before ending the sprite batch. Finally, it invokes the base class's method.
